enable.service.ctrip.enable.service.tip: Once enable Ctrip service, the Ctrip service will be activated.
enable.service.ctrip.enable.modal.title: Bind and enable Ctrip service
enable.service.ctrip.enable.modal.tip1: If you already have your Ctrip account, please close the window and click the link to bind.
enable.service.ctrip.enable.modal.tip3: You can only open middle-scale Ctrip account. If you wish to share large-scale Ctrip service, please contact your Ctrip account manager and bind the account in Helios.
enable.service.ctrip.enable.modal.tip4: Click continue to create a new company account.
enable.service.ctrip.bind.account: Already have an account? Click [here] to bind.
enable.service.ctrip.bind.title: Bind your Ctrip account
enable.service.ctrip.bind.modal.tip: If you already have your Ctrip account, click here to bind.
enable.service.ctrip.success.title: Success
enable.service.didi.bind.modal.tip: If you already have your Didi Authenticate account, click here to bind.
enable.service.didi.bind.title: Bind your Didi account
enable.service.didi.enable.service.tip: Once enable Didi, the expense will auto-synchronize to your journal.
enable.service.didi.enable.service.step1: Click to visit the Didi-Helios Enterprise Platform to login.
enable.service.didi.enable.service.step2: After successful login with your admin account, the service will be activated.
If you do not have an account, please register with Didi first.
enable.service.didi.enable.service.step3: After successful login, the service will be activated.
Please help to refresh the page if the status is not changed.
enable.service.jd.step.three.des1: Click bind and wait for the result.
enable.service.jd.step.three.des2: After successfully minded the account & back to the first page.
enable.service.jd.modal.title: Bind your JD account
enable.service.jd.modal.des: If you already have your JD account, please input the following fields
enable.service.hrs.modal.title: Bind your HRS account
enable.service.jd.enable.tip2: You may utilize JD after binding your account
enable.service.tc.enable.tip2: Click to enable LY Train Service
